args:
Determine whether this social media post from Donald Trump contains a personal insult to Kamala Harris's intelligence. Simply return "yes" or "no".
content: RT @TeamTrumpPRESIDENT TRUMP: "Last Thanksgiving, I visited the Southern Border near McAllen, Texas, where patriots of the Texas National Guard were doing the job that Kamala Harris refused to do— In fact, when our Guardsmen put up razor wire and buoys to stop illegal crossings, Kamala and Biden SUED to take the border defenses down."
